ing: 1/2 fluid ounce chocolate liqueur (such as GodivaÂ®)
des: "This drink tastes just like a chocolate-covered cherry! Very simple to make. I used organic unsweetened black cherry juice."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add vodka, cherry juice, triple sec, and chocolate liqueur. Cover the shaker and shake until cocktail is chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.
